name: Trackalyse
overview:
ClipSure Adtracker monitors your competitors marketing spend and TV buying activity. ClipSure provides television monitoring of competitors media activity and TV advertisers and broadcasters a range of SaaS based video analysis and research services designed to bridge the divide between traditional TV and the Internet.

The company provides broadcasters with a range of services to leverage the Internet directly through accessing extensive archives online, to analysing TV content against business performance indicators.

ClipSure has recently launched a disruptive TV advertisement monitoring service that is web based, self service and a low cost alternative to traditional TV ad intelligence offerings but still delivers an equally effective tool for advertisers and their agencies to monitor competitor creative copy, TV campaign activity and strategy.

The company monitors the majority of the UKâ€™s top rated TV channels both terrestrial and satellite and is adding to its coverage footprint over time in the UK and elsewhere. The services are accessible via the companyâ€™s website www.clipsure.co.uk

ClipSure was founded by Brothers Charlie Ardagh and Rory Ardagh who have extensive track records in building, owning and operating telecoms and media businesses over the past 12 years. The company is funded by Enterprise Ireland the Irish governmentâ€™s venture capital arm along with a leading venture capital investment syndicate.

ClipSure is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland a centre of excellence for technology businesses in Europe with sales offices in London, UK.
